item.title: Game of Life | A Digital Universe
item.description: How four tiny rules create a digital universe of life, logic, and surprising complexity.

item.title: Meet the Puppet Master Living in Your Skull
item.description: A dive into Libet experiments, veto windows, and the neuroscience behind why your brain may be pulling the strings long before 'you' decide anything.
